Review Text: We stayed 2 nights in this gorgeous property in low season and we absolutely loved it! We were welcomed by Pak Reza who informed us on the hotel facilities and ensured we got booked on the shuttle going into town. Throughout our stay, he greeted us by our name and enquired how we were. The room was very clean, with full amenities and very cute. Oh and with a lovely bathtub!! The breakfast buffet was varied and plentiful with a mix from Mediterranean to Indonesian and Western food and yummy juices. We loved the pool and spent a couple of hour in the heat of the day to cool down. It was so quiet with great tunes playing in the background. The property is set on a beautiful beach and surrounded by lush tropical vegetation. We had view on the gardens and the sea and felt so lucky! Nitiya helped us checking out and also did a fantastic job! I will definitely come back soon! Thank you Pullman Team !

We spent the day at the pool here. We had the entire area and even beach to ourselves, which was lovely. The hotel is located in a private cove with no other developments, making it especially tranquil. So much so that we witnessed a herd of buffalo casually wander across our view of the sea. We both ordered food, and it was all delicious and well priced. The manager on duty, Jaelani, was an absolute joy to be around. He attended to our every need and was engaged with us on a friendly, personal level. Price for the deckchairs is good compared to other resorts nearby, and it‚Äôs all credit against food and drink anyway. Though we didn‚Äôt stay the night, we wouldn't hesitate to if we ever come back, just based on the high-end experience we had at the pool. Highly recommend Pullman Lombok for a peaceful, uplifting day next to the sea!

I had a lovely stay at Pullman Lombok Merujani Mandalika Beach Resort. As an Platinum member, I was pleasantly surprised with a complimentary upgrade to a Garden Suite with sundeck, which truly elevated the entire experience. The suite was spacious, comfortable, and very private, with a beautiful outdoor sundeck that made it perfect for relaxing and unwinding. The resort itself is stunning‚Äîpeaceful beachfront, well-designed public areas, and a great pool to enjoy throughout the day. The team was warm and welcoming, as always. Breakfast was enjoyable with a good variety,. I look forward to returning again.

Pullman Lombok ‚Äì a rare blend of tranquillity, quality and genuine human kindness We stayed at Pullman Lombok and from the very first moment it felt like coming home. The hotel is located in a beautifully quiet area, offering exactly the serene atmosphere you hope for when travelling. Everything here just works: the food is delicious, the rooms are stylish, and above all‚Ä¶ the staff truly makes the difference. From day one, everyone addressed us by name, always with a sincere smile. You feel seen, remembered, and genuinely welcomed ‚Äî and that creates a warmth that you don‚Äôt find everywhere. But the moment that touched us most came when we had issues with our flight and we had to return to the hotel. We spent nine hours in the lobby, tired and frustrated by the situation. Still, the team remained friendly, understanding and deeply human. When we booked another room that wasn‚Äôt ready yet, it took them literally five minutes to arrange a different one so we could settle in right away. No fuss, no excuses ‚Äî just pure care and kindness. That combination of professional service and almost family-like warmth is rare. And it truly touched us. In short: Pullman Lombok is a place where luxury meets humanity. A hotel you don‚Äôt just stay at ‚Äî you feel held. A genuine recommendation in every sense.

Our stay at Pullman Resort Lombok was nothing short of exceptional. Everything was incredibly well organized, making our experience smooth and relaxing from start to finish. The breakfast buffet was outstanding ‚Äî impressively large with endless options to choose from. Whether you prefer warm or cold dishes, sweet or savory, there truly is something for everyone. It was one of the best breakfast experiences we‚Äôve ever had. The shuttle bus to Kuta is a fantastic service that adds real convenience to the stay. A special mention goes to our driver, Athar, who was extremely friendly and helpful throughout the ride. His kindness made the trip even more enjoyable. Overall, we highly recommend Pullman Resort Lombok. An unforgettable experience with top-tier service in every aspect.

I had an amazing stay at Pullman Lombok! The room was spacious, clean, and luxurious. Truly a 5-star experience. The breakfast spread was delicious with plenty of great options to choose from. The pool and beach areas were absolutely stunning, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the view. Most importantly, the staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful throughout our stay. From the moment we arrived, the team made us feel genuinely welcomed. A special mention to Dela, who went out of her way to ensure we always had delicious and well-prepared vegetarian options. We stayed at the hotel for 4 days whilst in Kuta, Lombok: Pros: -Staff are lovely and friendly and will go over and beyond for the guests. -The hotel complex pool and beach are beautiful, the rooms are modern and the restaurant and pool bar are a huge plus. The hotel menu does not show the difference between vegan vs vegetarian dishes and staff are often unsure. The buffet breakfast had very poor options for vegans for the price ($40 pp each day). -You can not get grab, gojek or any other taxi to and from the hotel which is a HUGE pain if you don‚Äôt ride a scooter. Staff can order taxis via local drivers but this comes at a massive inflated price which left a bad taste in our mouth as we could see that the prices were a huge rip off compared to taxi prices in Kuta. The hotel charged us $70 for a transfer to the hotel from the port and we saw you could get a transfer at the port for $45. The hotel tried to charge me $45 each way to visit a town one hour away (this was $15 each way from Kuta). We felt like the hotel were cashing in on the fact that there were no other taxi options from the hotel which was disappointing. -The hotel is a 45 minute walk away from Kuta and not near any other restaurants or bars. Coastal Bliss at Pullman Lombok Mandalika: Seaside Serenity in the Lap of Luxury Embarking on a coastal escapade at the newly built Pullman Lombok Mandalika, I reveled in the tranquility of the Executive Room Balcony, an experience that unfolded at a rate of Rp4,244,680. This beachside haven captivated with its perfect sea view, direct beach access, and impeccably designed rooms. Seaside Retreat: The Executive Room Balcony offered an enchanting panorama of the sea, creating a serene backdrop that defined the essence of coastal living. The private balcony became a personal sanctuary, providing a perfect spot to unwind while soaking in the breathtaking views of the Lombok coast. Direct Beach Access: One of the key highlights was the convenience of direct beach access from the property. The seamless transition from the hotel to the pristine beach allowed for unhindered exploration of the shoreline and immersive experiences by the ocean. Impeccable Room Design: The allure of the stay was further enhanced by the thoughtfully designed room. The interiors reflected a harmonious blend of comfort and sophistication, creating an inviting atmosphere that resonated with the coastal surroundings. Gym and Location Nuances: While the overall experience was exceptional, the gym, albeit functional, presented a more compact space. The smaller size might pose a challenge for those seeking an extensive workout facility. Additionally, the somewhat remote location, though offering a beachside retreat, might be considered a drawback for those prioritizing proximity to the airport. Mandalika Circuit Proximity: A redeeming factor for the remote location was the hotel's proximity to the Mandalika Circuit. For motorsport enthusiasts, this added allure, allowing easy access to the nearby racing circuit and creating a unique dimension to the stay. Culinary Delights: The culinary journey unfolded with a great breakfast spread, featuring Indonesian specialties in the main restaurant. The diverse flavors and culinary craftsmanship added a delightful touch to the morning dining experience. In Conclusion: My stay at Pullman Lombok Mandalika, in the Executive Room Balcony, epitomized coastal bliss and refined seaside living. The perfect sea view, direct beach access, and impeccably designed rooms created a harmonious retreat. While nuances like the gym size and the location's distance from the airport exist, the overall experience affirms Pullman Lombok Mandalika as a coastal gem, offering a serene escape for those seeking seaside serenity.
